page.title: 13Lincoln's Inn 05300181
page.content: Between{Kingsway}and{Drury Lane,}apart from the many offices, there are homes for many people. The{SE}sector has very strong connections to the legal profession with part of the Royal Courts of Justice in the extreme SE corner and another of the Inns of Court - Lincoln's Inn and Lincoln's Inn Fields covering a large part of this area. Lincoln's Inn Fields offers a place for recreation with tennis and netball courts or just a place for people to sit for some relative peace and quiet! On the corner of{Kingsway} and{Aldwych}is St Catherine's House, the successor to Somerset House as the home of the Registry of Births, Deaths and Marriages. People from all over the world as well as this country come here to try to trace theit ancestry and to obtain copies of the various certificates. {continued.....
